content: To reset your password, visit the Self-Service Portal at portal.company.com. Select 'Forgot Password', complete the Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) challenge, and follow the on-screen instructions to set a new secure password. Ensure your new password meets complexity requirements.

If your system is running slowly, open Task Manager (Ctrl+Shift+Esc) to identify applications with high CPU or Memory usage. End unnecessary tasks. If the issue continues, clear your browser cache and restart your computer to refresh system resources.

For VPN connectivity problems, ensure your internet connection is stable. Open the Cisco AnyConnect client and click 'Disconnect', then 'Connect'. If that fails, restart your computer and try reinstalling the VPN profile from the IT software center.

If Outlook is not syncing, check your internet connection first. close and reopen Outlook. If the issue matches 'Need Password' in the status bar, click it to re-authenticate. You can also try Outlook Web Access (OWA) to verify if the issue is with the client or account.

Approved software can be installed directly from the Company App Store found in your Start Menu. For software not listed there, please submit a 'Software Request' ticket via the IT Portal. Manager approval is required for licensed software.

Ensure the printer is powered on and connected to the network. Remove and re-add the printer via 'Printers & Scanners' settings. If printing fails, verify there are no paper jams and that you are on the corporate network/VPN.

Restart your local router/modem. If internal resources are unreachable, verify VPN connection. For office network issues, check if the ethernet cable is secure. Contact IT if multiple users are affected.

User accounts lock automatically after 5 incorrect password attempts. The account will auto-unlock after 30 minutes. For immediate access, contact the Help Desk to verify your identity and unlock the account manually.

New hardware requests (monitors, laptops, peripherals) must be submitted via the 'Hardware Request Form' on the IT Portal. These requests require budgetary approval from your line manager before processing.

All employees must adhere to the Information Security Policy. Key points: Lock your screen when away (Win+L), do not share passwords, report suspicious emails using the 'Report Phishing' button, and keep software updated.
